headline: A Look At Constellation Energy’s Valuation As New Data Center Power Deal Expands Its Role In The Digital Economy
summary: Constellation Energy (CEG) is back in focus after its Calpine unit agreed to supply 380 MW of power and site infrastructure to CyrusOne’s new Texas data center, along with exclusivity on a second 380 MW phase. See our latest analysis for Constellation Energy. The new CyrusOne agreement comes after a tough stretch for the stock, with a 30 day share price return of a 23.68% decline and a 90 day share price return of a 25.66% decline. However, the three year total shareholder return of 210.14%...

headline: Is Constellation’s Growing Data Center Power Pipeline Reshaping The Investment Case For Constellation Energy (CEG)?
summary: Constellation announced that Calpine, its newly acquired business unit, signed a 380 MW agreement with data center operator CyrusOne to power a new facility adjacent to the Freestone Energy Center in Freestone County, Texas, with an exclusive option for a second 380 MW phase. This latest deal, building on prior 400 MW arrangements at the Thad Hill Energy Center, highlights Constellation’s growing role in supplying large-scale power and infrastructure to energy-intensive data centers amid...

headline: Constellation and CyrusOne Announce Agreement to Support New Data Center Facility at Freestone Energy Center in Texas
summary: BALTIMORE & DALLAS, February 09, 2026--Constellation announced that Calpine LLC, a business unit of Constellation, signed a 380-MW deal with CyrusOne to connect and serve a new data center.
